stripped_text: Whenever the Corp creates a server, he or she loses 1 credit. Whenever you make a successful run on Archives, you may trash Hijacked Router to force the Corp to lose 3 credits.
text:
Whenever the Corp creates a server, he or she loses 1[credit].
Whenever you make a successful run on Archives, you may trash Hijacked Router to force the Corp to lose 3[credit].
title: Hijacked Router
